messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node?
The purpose of the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node is to assist in sequentially loading images by providing a simple counter that resets when the 'Queue Prompt' is pressed.
In which category can you find the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node in the menu?
The ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node can be found in the 'utils' category in the menu.
How does the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node count during batch execution?
During batch execution, the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node counts up starting from the value set in the 'start' parameter.
What happens to the count when the 'Queue Prompt' is pressed in the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node?
When the 'Queue Prompt' is pressed in the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node, the count is reset.
What is the recommended way to use the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node?
It is recommended to use the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node together with the 'Load Image Batch' node from WAS Node Suite, setting the batch count accordingly.
What is the license for the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node?
The license for the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node allows for free distribution and modification.
How is the processing handled in the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node?
In the ComfyUI-SimpleCounter node, the node definition is done on the Python side, while all processing is handled on the JavaScript side.
